section.heading: Regulation of commercial and business activities on Memorial day and Independence day

content.p:
ยง 86. Regulation of commercial and business activities on Memorial day
and Independence day. The municipal officers and boards in the several
cities, towns and villages of this state now having the authority to
enact ordinances and local laws, may adopt ordinances or local laws
regulating the nature of commercial and business activities that may be
conducted on Memorial day and Independence day and the hours within
which the various types of commercial and business activities may be
conducted on Memorial day and Independence day. Provision shall be made
in such ordinances or local laws for punishment of violations thereof.
